import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; import photo1 from '../assets/img/Mentor.jpeg'; import photo2 from '../assets/img/BookNow.png'; import photo3 from '../assets/img/becomeMentor.jpeg'; import photo4 from '../assets/img/swirl.png'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { STAMMERING_STATUS_MAP } from '../constants/map'; export const Mentor = () => { const [showDropdown, setShowDropDown] = useState(4); const isMobile = useMediaQuery({ query: `(max-width: 600px)` }); useEffect(() => { setShowDropDown(1); }, [OwlCarousel]); // let navigate = useNavigate(); // const handleBooking = (e) => { // navigate("/mentor/" + props.mentorObj.name, { // replace: false, state: { mentorObj: props.mentorObj } // }); // } return (

Meet Our Mentor

Realize your fullest potential and lay a concrete path to recovery with industry-best doctors and
experienced mentors who are here to give you affordable, but and step-by-step support
to embolden you with your highest self!

1:1 Mentorship

Book 1:1 Mentorship sessions with friends who have overcome stammering themselves

Join Events

Interact with fellow stammerers with various events

Parents of Stammerers

Parents of stammerers can connect among themselves

{/*

Speech Therapists

Connect with multiple Speech Therapists

*/}

Some kind feedback from our dear stammerers
